N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.2 - Requirement to make a predetermination grant

State Regulations
(a) A social services official administering
ADC shall: (1)
provide a predetermination
grant to all applicants who are in need and who are presumed to be
categorically eligible; and
(2)
transfer to a predetermination grant all HR recipients who are presumptively
eligible for ADC immediately upon the identification of such
eligibility. (b) A
social services official administering ADC shall offer an ADC recipient
presumptively eligible for SSI the option of receiving SSI. Notes
